testcase.name: Register with empty data
testcase.system-out: Given I am on ZingPoll website "chrome".....................................passed And I click the SignIn button...............................................passed Then The SignIn form should be shown........................................passed And I click on NewUser radiobox.............................................passed When I enter fullname "" and email "" and password "" and confirmPassword "".passed And I click Register button.................................................passed Then I verify the fullname error message "Please enter your name."..........passed And I verify the email error message "Please enter your email.".............passed And I verify the password error message "Please enter your password"........passed And I verify the confirm password error message "The re-type password is required and cannot be empty.".passed And I verify the agree error message "Please agree with the term!"..........passed
